p.span: Additional Resources during these difficult times:

lllinois Department of Human Services' Mental Health Division launched a free-of-charge emotional support text line, Call4Calm for IL residents experiencing stress/mental health issues related to COVID-19. People who would like to speak to a mental health professional can text "TALK" to 552020 or for Spanish, "HABLAR" also to 552020. Individuals remain anonymous. Once a person sends a text to the hotline, within 24 hours they will receive a call back from a counselor.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: "Helvetica Neue"; min-height: 14px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: People can also text 552020 with keywords such as "unemployment" or "food" or "shelter" and will receive information on how to navigate and access other supports and services.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: "Helvetica Neue"; min-height: 14px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;

li.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;
li.span: Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds or use hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol.

li.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;
li.span: Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.

li.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;
li.span: Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue, then throw the tissue in the trash. Wash your hands following the use of a tissue.

li.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;
li.span: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.

h2.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-family: "Fjalla One", sans-serif; line-height: 1.4; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); margin-top: 24px; margin-bottom: 12px; font-size: 28px; text-align: center;
